GapFillDragDrop.Title: Prefer + noun/-ing
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Click on a response and drag it to the correct gap.
GapFillDragDrop.ContentGapFillDragDrop:
1. A: This suitcase is really heavy. B: I'll carry it.
2. A: I haven't got any money. B: Don't worry. We'll pay for you.
3. A: My car isn't working. B: My husband's a mechanic. He'll repair it.
4. A: Is that the phone? B:Yes, I'll answer it.
5. A: This is a really good menu. I think I'll have the fish.
6. A: It's late. Why are you still in the office? B: I'm finishing something. I'll leave in five minutes.
7. A:I'd like some beef at the weekend. B: OK.I'll buy some.
8. A: It's very cold outside. I think I'll put my coat on.
9. A: I can't find my glasses. B: They're in the bathroom. I'll get them.
10. A: Have we got today's newspaper? B: No, I'll get one.
